name: Basic skill
explanation:
Enable to apply Basic Interface Skills
[Lv 1]: Enable Chat
Allow to use chat
[Lv 3]: Enable Trade
Allow to Trade items with another Character
[Lv 5]: Enable to join party
Allow to join a party.
[Lv 6]: Enable to use Kafra Storage
Allow to use an extra inventory that can hold 300 types of items. Talk to a Kafra to access it. All town Kafras offer this service, but some located in the wilderness may not.
[Lv 7]: Enable to organize party
Allow to organize a party.
[Lv 9]: Enable transform into 1st profession
Allow to change one's Job into the 1st profession.

name: Sword Mastery
explanation:
Increases damage with Daggers and Swords (1-handed only) by 4*SkillLV.
[Lv 1]: ATK + 4
[Lv 2]: ATK + 8
[Lv 3]: ATK + 12
[Lv 4]: ATK + 16
[Lv 5]: ATK + 20
[Lv 6]: ATK + 24
[Lv 7]: ATK + 28
[Lv 8]: ATK + 32
[Lv 9]: ATK + 36
[Lv 10]: ATK + 40

name: Two-Handed Sword Mastery
explanation:
Increases damage with Two-Handed Swords by 4*SkillLV.
[Lv 1]: ATK + 4
